item.title: Genesis of the project
item.description: Introductory post Introductory post on why we wanted to start this philanthropy project Internal goals of (i) giving back, (ii) gaining experience in running philanthropy with personal capital before been entrusted with external funding, (iii) to practice donating money effectively, (iv) to learn how money can best be used to help those in need, (v) matching funds to increase dollar impact, (vi) to learn about the conditions of the world outside of Australia/New Zealandâ€¦
